jacdac.MotionReg.Angle:
Constant Â° uint16_t. Opening of the field of view
* ```
const [angle] = jdunpack<[number]>(buf, "u16")
```
jacdac.MotionReg.MaxDistance:
Constant m u16.16 (uint32_t). Maximum distance where objects can be detected.
* ```
const [maxDistance] = jdunpack<[number]>(buf, "u16.16")
```
jacdac.MotionReg.Moving:
Read-only bool (uint8_t). Reports is movement is currently detected by the sensor.
* ```
const [moving] = jdunpack<[number]>(buf, "u8")
```
jacdac.MotionReg.Variant:
Constant Variant (uint8_t). Type of physical sensor
* ```
const [variant] = jdunpack<[jacdac.MotionVariant]>(buf, "u8")
```
modules.MotionClient: A sensor, typically PIR, that detects object motion within a certain range
modules.MotionClient.angle: Opening of the field of view
modules.MotionClient.maxDistance: Maximum distance where objects can be detected.
modules.MotionClient.moving: Reports is movement is currently detected by the sensor.
modules.MotionClient.onEvent: Register code to run when an event is raised
